title: Autonomous VTOL UAV
hurdle: Testing the flight controller logic safely without risking hardware damage.
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const r={code:"code",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return i(e,{children:[n(r.p,{children:"A custom-built Vertical Take-Off and Landing (VTOL) Unmanned Aerial Vehicle designed for fully autonomous missions. This project integrates embedded systems, real-time telemetry, and computer vision to create a drone capable of self-correction and intelligent pathfinding."}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"üõ∞Ô∏è System Architecture"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["The system is split into two main components: the ",n(r.strong,{children:"Onboard Flight Systems"})," and the ",n(r.strong,{children:"Ground Control Station"}),"."]}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"Onboard Hardware"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Compute"}),": Raspberry Pi 4 (8GB) handling high-level logic and video encoding."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Flight Controller"}),": Pixhawk running ArduPilot for low-level stabilization."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Communication"}),": LoRa Transceiver for long-range telemetry and RC control."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Sensors"}),": GPS, Barometer, IMU, and a dedicated Pi Camera for visual input."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"Ground Control Station (GCS)"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:'The "brain" of the autonomy stack resides on a high-performance laptop acting as the GCS.'}),"
",i(r.ol,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Telemetry Link"}),": Receives mavlink packets via the transceiver."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Video Stream"}),": Decodes low-latency video feed transmitted from the RPi."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Inference Engine"}),": Runs object detection and path planning algorithms on the GPU."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Command Relay"}),": Sends corrected flight vectors back to the UAV in real-time."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"üß† The Autonomy Pipeline"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"The core challenge was closing the loop between visual perception and flight control over a wireless link."}),"
",n(r.pre,{children:n(r.code,{className:"language-mermaid",children:"graph LR
    A[Raspberry Pi Camera] --\x3e|Encoded Video| B[Transceiver]
    B --\x3e|Wireless Link| C[Laptop GCS]
    C --\x3e|Inference Model| D[Path Planner]
    D --\x3e|MAVLink Commands| B
    B --\x3e|Control Signal| E[Pixhawk FC]
"})}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"1. Visual Navigation"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["The Raspberry Pi streams 720p video to the GCS. Using ",n(r.strong,{children:"OpenCV"})," and a custom ",n(r.strong,{children:"YOLO"})," model, the laptop identifies landing zones and obstacles. The decision to offload processing to the ground station allowed for much heavier models than the Pi could run onboard."]}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"2. Control Loop"}),"
",i(r.p,{children:["Once a target is identified, the laptop calculates the necessary roll, pitch, and yaw adjustments. These are converted into ",n(r.strong,{children:"MAVLink"})," commands and sent back to the drone. The latency was optimized to be under 100ms to ensure stable flight characteristics."]}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"üöß Challenges"}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"Bandwidth vs. Latency"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:"Streaming video and telemetry simultaneously over a limited bandwidth radio link required aggressive compression. I implemented a custom UDP protocol to prioritize the latest frame, dropping dropped packets immediately rather than re-requesting them."}),"
",n(r.h3,{children:"Failsafe Mechanisms"}),"
",n(r.p,{children:'Reliance on a ground station introduces a critical point of failure: connection loss. To mitigate this, the onboard Raspberry Pi runs a lightweight "Keep-Alive" watchdog. If the link is severed for more than 500ms, the drone automatically switches to a "Return to Launch" (RTL) mode using its onboard GPS.'}),"
",n(r.h2,{children:"üîÆ Future Improvements"}),"
",i(r.ul,{children:["
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Onboard Edge AI"}),": Moving inference to a Coral Edge TPU to remove the dependency on the ground station."]}),"
",i(r.li,{children:[n(r.strong,{children:"Swarm Logic"}),": Enabling communication between multiple UAVs for coordinated formation flight."]}),"
"]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: FerrOS
hurdle: Writing a robust task scheduler to manage process execution.
content:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(l){const t={code:"code",del:"del",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",hr:"hr",img:"img",input:"input",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...l.components};return i(e,{children:[i(t.p,{children:[n(t.img,{src:"https://img.shields.io/badge/language-Rust-rust.svg",alt:"Language"}),"
",n(t.img,{src:"https://img.shields.io/badge/status-in%20development-orange.svg",alt:"Status"}),"
",n(t.img,{src:"https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg",alt:"License"}),"
",n(t.img,{src:"https://img.shields.io/github/actions/workflow/status/SammmE/ferros/rust.yml",alt:"GitHub Actions Workflow Status"})]}),"
",i(t.p,{children:["A barebones, ",n(t.code,{children:"no_std"})," operating system kernel written from scratch in Rust, primarily for educational purposes."]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"ü¶Ä Why FerrOS?"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"This project is a journey into the world of low-level systems programming. The primary goals are:"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",n(t.li,{children:"To learn the fundamentals of operating system design and implementation."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"To explore the power of Rust for writing safe and efficient systems-level code."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"To understand hardware interaction, memory management, and process scheduling from the ground up."}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"To have fun building something challenging and rewarding!"}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"üõ†Ô∏è Building and Running"}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Prerequisites"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"You'll need the following tools to build and run FerrOS:"}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Install QEMU:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y qemu-system-x86
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Install Rust nightly toolchain:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"rustup toolchain install nightly
rustup override set nightly
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Install rust-src component:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"rustup component add rust-src
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Install llvm-tools-preview component:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"rustup component add llvm-tools-preview
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Install bootimage:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"cargo install bootimage
"})}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Running"}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Clone the repository:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"git clone [https://github.com/](https://github.com/)<YOUR_USERNAME>/ferros.git
cd ferros
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",n(t.p,{children:n(t.strong,{children:"Run the OS:"})}),"
",n(t.pre,{children:n(t.code,{className:"language-sh",children:"cargo run -- uefi
"})}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"üó∫Ô∏è Project Roadmap"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:'This is the high-level plan for FerrOS, from a "Hello, World!" kernel to a basic interactive system.'}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Phase 1: The Core Kernel & Bootstrapping"}),"
",i(t.ul,{className:"contains-task-list",children:["
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Project Setup:"})," Create a ",n(t.code,{children:"no_std"})," Rust binary."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Bootloader:"})," Integrate the ",n(t.code,{children:"bootimage"})," crate to create a bootable image.
",i(t.del,{children:["* [] ",n(t.strong,{children:"VGA Text Mode Driver:"})," Implement a basic logger to print formatted text to the screen."]})]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Set up FrameBuffer"}),": Implement a basic framebuffer to log and print text."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Panic Handler:"})," Implement a kernel panic function that prints info and halts."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Phase 2: Interrupts & Memory Management"}),"
",i(t.ul,{className:"contains-task-list",children:["
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"GDT (Global Descriptor Table):"})," Set up a basic GDT."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"IDT (Interrupt Descriptor Table):"})," Implement an IDT to handle CPU exceptions (e.g., page faults, double faults)."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Paging (Paging V4):"})," Implement a virtual memory manager, including mapping the kernel and setting up page tables."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Heap Allocator:"})," Provide a global allocator (like ",n(t.code,{children:"linked_list_allocator"}),") to enable using ",n(t.code,{children:"alloc"})," (e.g., ",n(t.code,{children:"Box"}),", ",n(t.code,{children:"Vec"}),")."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Physical Frame Allocator:"})," Create an allocator to manage physical memory frames (e.g., a simple bitmap or free list)."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Phase 3: Hardware & Concurrency"}),"
",i(t.ul,{className:"contains-task-list",children:["
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"PIC/APIC:"})," Handle hardware interrupts from the PIC (or APIC)."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"PIT (Programmable Interval Timer):"})," Set up the timer for scheduling."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"PS/2 Keyboard Driver:"})," Read scancodes from the keyboard and translate them to characters."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",checked:!0,disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Preemptive Multitasking:"})," Implement basic task switching and a simple scheduler."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Phase 4: Userspace & Filesystems"}),"
",i(t.ul,{className:"contains-task-list",children:["
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Syscalls:"})," Design and implement a basic syscall interface."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Userspace:"})," Create the ability to load and run a simple program in user mode."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Basic Filesystem:"})," Implement a RAM-based filesystem (initrd) to load initial user programs."]}),"
",i(t.li,{className:"task-list-item",children:[n(t.input,{type:"checkbox",disabled:!0})," ",n(t.strong,{children:"Basic Shell:"})," Create a minimal interactive shell to test keyboard input and run commands."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"ü§ù Contributing"}),"
",n(t.p,{children:"Contributions are welcome! This is a learning project, so feel free to open issues or pull requests."}),"
",n(t.h3,{children:"Guidelines"}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Fork"})," the repository."]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["Create a new branch: ",n(t.code,{children:"git checkout -b feature/your-new-feature"})]}),"
",n(t.li,{children:"Make your changes."}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Format your code:"})," ",n(t.code,{children:"cargo fmt"})]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Lint your code:"})," ",n(t.code,{children:"cargo clippy"})]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["Ensure the project builds: ",n(t.code,{children:"cargo build"})]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[n(t.strong,{children:"Open a Pull Request"})," with a clear description of your changes."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(t.hr,{}),"
",n(t.h2,{children:"üìÑ License"}),"
",i(t.p,{children:["This project is licensed under the ",n(t.strong,{children:"MIT License"}),". See the ",n(t.code,{children:"LICENSE"})," file for full details."]})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:i}=e.components||{};return i?n(i,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};

title: MNIST-OS
problem: Bare-metal AI without an Operating System.
hurdle: Figuring out how to load weights and images without making a disk.

title: OSCAR
problem: Building a web application for training and visualizing neural networks.
content:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(r){const t={a:"a",code:"code",h2:"h2",h3:"h3",h4:"h4",hr:"hr",li:"li",ol:"ol",p:"p",pre:"pre",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...r.components};return i(n,{children:[i(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"O"}),"bservational ",e(t.strong,{children:"S"}),"ystem for ",e(t.strong,{children:"C"}),"onfiguring & ",e(t.strong,{children:"A"}),"nalyzing ",e(t.strong,{children:"R"}),"eal‚Äëtime nets"]}),"
",e(t.p,{children:"A powerful, interactive neural network training and visualization platform built with React, TensorFlow.js, and modern web technologies. OSCAR provides real-time insights into neural network behavior, making machine learning education and experimentation more accessible and intuitive."}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"‚ú® Features"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"üéØ Interactive Neural Network Training"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Real-time Training"}),": Watch your neural networks learn with live metric updates"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Visual Feedback"}),": See weights, activations, and predictions update in real-time"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Training Controls"}),": Start, pause, resume, and step through training epochs"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Multiple Problem Types"}),": Support for both regression and classification tasks"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"üìä Advanced Visualization"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Network Architecture"}),": Interactive visualization of neural network layers and connections"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Layer Activations"}),": Real-time display of neuron activations across all layers"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Weight Visualization"}),": Live weight updates with visual thickness representing magnitude"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Training Metrics"}),": Comprehensive charts for loss, accuracy, and validation metrics"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Prediction Overlay"}),": See model predictions overlaid on your data"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"üîß Flexible Configuration"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Hyperparameter Tuning"}),": Easy-to-use interface for adjusting learning rates, optimizers, and architectures"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Custom Architectures"}),": Build networks with Dense, Conv1D, Conv2D, and Flatten layers"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Data Management"}),": Import your own datasets or use built-in sample data"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Activation Functions"}),": Support for ReLU, Sigmoid, Tanh, Softmax, and more"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"üöÄ Performance Optimized"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Web Workers"}),": Training runs in background workers to keep UI responsive"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"TensorFlow.js"}),": Leverages GPU acceleration when available"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Efficient Rendering"}),": Optimized visualization updates for smooth performance"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"üõ†Ô∏è Tech Stack"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Frontend"}),": React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Machine Learning"}),": TensorFlow.js, TensorFlow.js Visualization"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Visualization"}),": Recharts, React Flow, HTML2Canvas"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"State Management"}),": Zustand with LocalForage persistence"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"UI Components"}),": Radix UI primitives with custom styling"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Build Tool"}),": Vite with SWC compilation"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Code Quality"}),": Biome for linting and formatting"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"üì¶ Installation"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Prerequisites"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",e(t.li,{children:"Node.js 18+"}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"npm, yarn, or bun"}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Setup"}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:["
",e(t.p,{children:e(t.strong,{children:"Clone the repository"})}),"
",e(t.pre,{children:e(t.code,{className:"language-bash",children:"git clone https://github.com/SammmE/MARVIN.git
cd MARVIN
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",e(t.p,{children:e(t.strong,{children:"Install dependencies"})}),"
",e(t.pre,{children:e(t.code,{className:"language-bash",children:"npm install
# or
yarn install
# or
bun install
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",e(t.p,{children:e(t.strong,{children:"Start the development server"})}),"
",e(t.pre,{children:e(t.code,{className:"language-bash",children:"npm run dev
# or
yarn dev
# or
bun dev
"})}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["
",i(t.p,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Open your browser"}),"
Navigate to ",e(t.code,{children:"http://localhost:5173"})," to start using OSCAR"]}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"üöÄ Quick Start"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Basic Workflow"}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Data Tab"}),": Import your dataset or use sample data (sinusoid, spiral, etc.)"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Hyperparameters Tab"}),": Configure your network architecture and training parameters"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Model Tab"}),": Visualize your network architecture and see layer details"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Training Tab"}),": Train your model with real-time monitoring and controls"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Example: Training a Simple Regression Model"}),"
",i(t.ol,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:["Go to the ",e(t.strong,{children:"Data"}),' tab and select the "Sinusoid" preset']}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["Switch to ",e(t.strong,{children:"Hyperparameters"})," and set:","
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",e(t.li,{children:"2 Dense layers with 64 and 32 units"}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"ReLU activation functions"}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"Learning rate: 0.001"}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"Adam optimizer"}),"
"]}),"
"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:["Navigate to ",e(t.strong,{children:"Training"}),' and click "Start Training"']}),"
",e(t.li,{children:"Watch as your model learns to approximate the sine function!"}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"üìÅ Project Structure"}),"
",e(t.pre,{children:e(t.code,{className:"language-text",children:"src/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ components/          # Reusable UI components
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ ui/             # Base UI components (buttons, cards, etc.)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ activation-*.tsx # Activation function visualizations
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data-*.tsx      # Data management components
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ network-*.tsx   # Network visualization components
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ training-*.tsx  # Training control components
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lib/                # Core logic and state management
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ oscar-store.ts  # üéØ UNIFIED STORE - All application state management
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data-store.ts   # ‚ö†Ô∏è DEPRECATED - Use oscar-store.ts instead
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hyperparameters-store.ts # ‚ö†Ô∏è DEPRECATED - Use oscar-store.ts instead
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ model-store.ts  # ‚ö†Ô∏è DEPRECATED - Use oscar-store.ts instead
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ training-store.ts # ‚ö†Ô∏è DEPRECATED - Use oscar-store.ts instead
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tensorflow-monitor.ts # TensorFlow.js integration
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pages/              # Main application pages
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data.tsx        # Data import and preview
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ hyperparameters.tsx # Network configuration
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ model.tsx       # Model visualization
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ training.tsx    # Training interface
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ workers/            # Web workers for background processing
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ training-worker.ts # Neural network training worker
"})}),"
",e(t.h2,{children:"üéõÔ∏è Configuration"}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Supported Layer Types"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Dense"}),": Fully connected layers with configurable units and activation"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Conv1D"}),": 1D convolutional layers for sequence data"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Conv2D"}),": 2D convolutional layers for image data"]}),"
",i(t.li,{children:[e(t.strong,{children:"Flatten"}),": Flatten multi-dimensional input to 1D"]}),"
"]}),"
",e(t.h3,{children:"Activation Functions"}),"
",i(t.ul,{children:["
